title: Foundations of Quantitative Data Analysis Using SPSS: Case-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and General Understanding of Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment, focusing on cultivating data analysis skills for solving everyday or community issues

learning_goals: Learners perform data entry and cleaning processes using basic SPSS functions through real-world case studies
Learners interpret case-based infographics to explain key statistical concepts (mean, standard deviation, correlation)
Learners conduct descriptive statistics and basic analyses using SPSS according to simple research questions and submit summarized results as infographics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
